participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
i came from japan to teach high school over 10 years ago.
I miss my father every day.
I'm afraid of my mom coming back into my life and ruining my new life.
i am one of four siblings.

participant_2.background:
I am fortunate to have a job that allows me to be there for my family.
I met a horse that helped me to heal after my loss.
i look forward to retiring.
I love my family, but they can be very critical of me.
I play sports with my family and friends to stay fit and have fun.

content.text: Pretty good! I just finished teaching and I'm looking forward to the weekend.
That's great! What do you like to do on the weekend?
I usually spend time with my family and go skiing.
That sounds fun! I don't get to go skiing often, but I love it when I do.
I do! I love to play sports, especially basketball. I also love to read and spend time with my family.
Those are great hobbies! I love to play sports too, but I'm not very good at basketball.
Everyone is good at something! I'm sure you're great at something else.
Thanks! I appreciate that. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby. It's a classic and I love the characters and the story.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great read.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great weekend!
